description:
Market bags are great for shopping, excursions, and bringing a change of clothes to the office. Attach the bag to the upper position of the Travoy Bike Trailer to carry small items. The buckle-down flap and rigid base keep your items snug and secure while you pedal from A-to-B.

  • Made of water-resistant polyester with a rugged tarpaulin base
  • Removable rigid bottom gives cargo a solid base
  • 4 stowable attachment clips secure the bag to your Travoy
  • Pockets on the inside and 1 exterior slip pocket
  • Folding design secures closed with Velcro® tabs
  • Buckled cinch down webbing straps seal the top
  • Top carrying handle
  • Adjustable carry straps
  • Reflective trim for visibility and safety
  • Light loop
  • Capacity is 22L
  • Dimensions are 40 x 30 x 10cm
  • Works with 2010 and newer Travoy trailers
name: Burley Upper Market Bag - Unisex
